title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: package used download visualize data. contains basic functions downloading saving data file locations also removing unwanted columns clean . also contains function plotting list variables target variable analyze trends dataset. also exists function convert tables PNG files usage reports.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: package related ggplot2 library uses extensively creation visualizations. differs library since can used visualize tables well plots. allows tables easily incorporated reports PNGs. package also similar dplyr package since allow users filter unwanted data datasets. However, data cleaning function package less flexibility filter function dyplr package.
